text: Heca te hoya, jyaca subha samacara allaha tya dasanna deta ahe jyanni imana rakhale ani (paigambara acaranasailinusara) karma karita rahile, tevha sanga ki mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala icchita nahi, parantu nate-sambandhace prema, ani jo manusya satkarma karila amhi tyacya satkarmata anakhi jasta vadhakaru. Nihsansaya, allaha motha mapha karanara, motha kadara jananara ahe
